offences.offenceWording: On 10/08/2016 At threadneedle street EC2 Being a passenger on a Public service Vehicle operated on behalf of London Bus Services Limited being used for the carriage of passengers at separate fares where the vehicle was being operated by a Driver without a Conductor did not as directed by the Driver an Inspector or a Notice displayed on the vehicle pay the fare for the journey in accordance with the direction
offences.prosecutionFacts: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipiscing elit sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
offences.witnessStatement: Dear Transport for London I would like copies of the following 1. All MG11 Statement templates which are written by RPIs.already worded for ease of completion to cover ticketless travel fare evasion and bylaw offences. If possible in word document format.If these are not available examples of previously used statements (obviously omitting the RPI & Defendants details)which have successfully been used in court.
